titles.title: District of Columbia Legislative Autonomy Act of 2007
To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to eliminate Congressional review of newly-passed District laws.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Oversight and Government Reform
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E360-361)
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia.

committee.name: House Oversight and Government Reform
committee.subcommittee: Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Oversight and Government Reform
committee.subcommittee: Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote .
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

bill.summary:
2/14/2007--Introduced.
District of Columbia Legislative Autonomy Act of 2007 - Amends the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to eliminate congressional review of newly-passed District laws.
